request.description:
Returns all departments with custom and master departments.
Response includes:
- id: Department ID
- code: Department code (NULL for custom)
- name: company_department_name OR master department_name
- is_custom: true/false flag
- department_id: Master department ID (NULL for custom)

request.description:
Create a new workflow configuration. Company ID is automatically taken from authenticated user's token. No need to pass company_id in body.

**Valid Approver Types:**
- `RM` - Reporting Manager
- `RM_OF_RM` - Skip Level Manager / Manager's Manager
- `HR_ADMIN` - HR Admin
- `HOD` - Head of Department
- `FUNCTIONAL_HEAD` - Functional Head
- `SUB_ADMIN` - Sub Admin
- `SECONDARY_RM` - Secondary Reporting Manager
- `SELF` - Self Approval
- `AUTO_APPROVE` - Auto Approve
- `CUSTOM_USER` - Custom Specific User (requires custom_user_id)
Get all workflow configurations for the authenticated user's company. Company ID is automatically taken from token. No need to pass company_id as query parameter.
Clone an existing workflow configuration. Company ID is automatically taken from authenticated user's token.
